attributes.action: In accordance with his stated aim to clean up politics,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: instigate legislation to appoint completely independent inspectors to investigate and approve or reject each and every expenses claim submitted by all members of parliament, members of the house of Lords, and  local council officers for any purpose whatsoever prior to its payment.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
